text: The 2018 Australian motorcycle Grand Prix was the seventeenth round of the 2018 MotoGP season. It was held at the Phillip Island Grand Prix Circuit in Phillip Island on 28 October 2018. ==Classification== ===MotoGP=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! Pos. ! No. ! Rider ! Team !
